data.name: Food Wars! The Third Plate: The One Who Aims for the Summit
data.short_description: Soma battles with the First Seat of the Totsuki Elite Ten, Tsukasa. If Soma loses, he has to join Central and Tsukasa wagers seat in the Elite Ten. Their topic is French cuisine using venison. However, Soma pulls out an unlikely ingredient and a bizarre tool. The judges for this battle end up...

English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
